channel.title: Adding Timers - John
channel.description:
Before I go to sleep i would like someone to provide me a url to a site/spiecal spot i can find out how to add timers. My last one had 7 errors so i got pretty far for never touching timers. The thing i need timers for is combat. Pking and Safe Npc killing. I would appriciate all help in this field. You could also just post a miniture tutorial for me to follow. Thanks!
Merry Christmas for all you Christians, Good night - John

Depends on how you have it. but sure add a 0 :\ anyway I need your msn because i may have you blocked because when I cleaned my list I block and delete. I deleted my mate from school on accident too. He hasnt gotten ahold of me yet :i[/quote]

I’ve sent you a pm with my email.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I thought the timers were divided by 10? So therefore it would wait .4 seconds, if you wanted to wait 4 seconds, you put 40. Why? Boolean process calls it every about 500MS, (Half a second) So you get my point.

In Case 73: Which is attacking in wilderness, if the pking delay is less or equal to 1. It should say that.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

I would like it to be like shown above.

If i were to put

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip
{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;

it would delay 4seconds

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=227070.msg1952971#msg1952971 date=1198622287]
Errr, where exactly would I add all this. Maybe I’m adding it wrong. Java if you know it you can add my msn I dunno if i had you or not but I deleted my list because I had 67 contacts.[/quote]

I think i’ve added you on my personal email. I checked, yes i have, but you are offline, i’ll re-add you.

What do you want the timer to do? What do you want it to be? Explain to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Well it depends what kind of timer you want to do? If its a timer like the one’s you’ve posted above…

You have to do everything possible to check if its 0 or less then 1.

Like if you look at this:

if(PkingDelay <= 1) { //DoWhatever

If its less or equal 1 it will do the action, otherwise it wouldn’t do anything. And of course under the process it would be decreased by 1:

PkingDelay -= 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:

What’s stopping you from using:

PkingDelay or wepdelay

??

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Omg it’s mod adam, haven’t seen you in awhile. Anyway I’ll reserve this post to show you a piece of code in a different source.

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here
{
PkingDelay = 20;
wepdelay = 20;
}

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip
{
PkingDelay = 40;
wepdelay = 40;
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Timers - John
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

[quote=“sigex, post:3, topic:167637”]process noob with 155 rep? pfft?

have like
if(timername > 0){
timername–;
}[/quote]

   Ahh to think i complimented you, well yes I am a Newb in some cases. Yet i never learned how to add timers because never did I need them. I am trying to work off of BattleScape Blitz, which of course has no timers. I need to figure out how to add them because I'v never gotten past 7errors because I never tried. Also reputation is a mere Number, I look at rep as if I'm being respected for what I do or my personality. I help people every day when I can because when I started to learn about this I was flamed to stop getting help so I learned on my own. This is my newest user so it has a different start date. I hope you understand what I'm trying to say,

Have a good one,
John

Also Newb - Beginner
and Noob - I take as disrespect

Btw thats not it.

Read full topic
